global_params.mongo_url: [string] - mongo url (ex: mongodb://localhost:27017 or mongodb://splmongo if you are using Docker), or you can use free account form mongodb.com

splinterlands_account_name.minimum_balance_description: [number] - how much balance you want to keep in your account
splinterlands_account_name.active_key: [string] - active key for buying and selling cards
splinterlands_account_name.rc_from_description: [string] - optional - when rc is low, delegates it from this account
splinterlands_account_name.rc_amount_b_description: [number] - optional - rc amount in Billions (10 = 10 Billion)

global_params.fetch_market_price_delay_dedsciption: [number] - delay in minutes between updating market prices
global_params.preferred_hive_node_description: [string] - optional - fastest hive node for you, can be checked by https://peakd.com/me/benchmark

bids.buy_pct_below_market: 20 - [number] - how much percent below market price should the bot buy cards

rules: either max_bcx_price or min_cp_per_usd or auto_set_buy_price or bellow_burn_value should be set
if you dont provide max_bcx bot will only buy 1 bcx cards
cards array if auto generated if editions, rarities, elements and types are provided
